intro: The following table shows the list of lifecycle rules already defined. To add new LifeCycle rules, please click on + Icon.
ComputedResultingProductTooltip: To link lifecycle of computed resulting product with Item for type(s) & commands selected(s)
SpecDocTooltip: To link lifecycle of Spec Doc with Item for type(s) & command(s) selected(s)
ChildTransformationTypesTooltip: To link lifecycle of child transformation types with Item for type(s) & command(s) selected(s)
NewRevisionTooltip: Couple LifeCycle of rules & types selected when creating New Revision & New Revision From.
NewBranchTooltip: Couple LifeCycle of rules & types selected when creating new branch.
DuplicateTooltip: Couple Duplicate & Advance Duplicate for rules & types selected.
TransferOwnershipTooltip: When modifying the owner of items of type selected, owner of rule(s) will also be modified.
ChangeMaturityTooltip: Couple maturity state between rule(s) selected & items for type(s) selected.
LockTooltip: Lock of Items will lock rule(s) selected
ChangeControlTooltip: Couple rules & items of type(s) selected for changing Control (Work Under a Change Action).
TransferTooltip: Couple moving of items with rule(s) to another Collaborative Space or organisation.
ShareTooltip: Couple sharing of rules with items of type(s) selected
DeleteTooltip: Deletion of items will imply deletion of rule(s) selected.
selectrulesMessage: Please select a rule : Computed Resulting product or Spec Doc or Child Transformation Types
selectcommandsMessage: Please select a command : New Revision, New Branch, Share...
